Source code for vpy.test_cal

import unittest
from .document import Document


[docs]class TestDU(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        doc = {'A':'a',
        'B':[ {'C':'c', 'D':'d'},{'E':'e', 'F':'f'}]
        }
        self.Cal = Document(doc)



[docs]    def test_get_1(self):
        """flat obj
        """
        o = {'A':'a', 'B':'b'}
        res = self.Cal.get_object('A', 'a', o)

        self.assertTrue(type(res) is dict)
        self.assertEqual(res['A'],'a')



[docs]    def test_get_2(self):
        """nested obj level 1
        """
        o = {'A':'a',
            'B':{'C':'c', 'D':'d'}
            }
        res = self.Cal.get_object('C', 'c', o)
        self.assertTrue(type(res) is dict)
        self.assertEqual(res['C'],'c')



[docs]    def test_get_3(self):
        """nested obj in list
        """
        o = {'A':'a','B':[{'C':'c', 'D':'d'},
        {'E':'e', 'F':'f'}] }
        res = self.Cal.get_object('C', 'c', o)
        self.assertTrue(type(res) is dict)
        self.assertEqual(res['C'],'c')



[docs]    def test_get_4(self):
        """nested obj in list, type not available
        """
        o = {'A':'a',
            'B':[{'C':'c', 'D':'d'}, {'E':'e', 'F':'f'}]
            }
        res = self.Cal.get_object('I', 'c', o)
        self.assertIsNone(res)



[docs]    def test_get_5(self):
        """nested obj in list, value not available
        """
        o = {'A':'a',
            'B':[
            {'C':'c', 'D':'d'}, {'E':'e', 'F':'f'}]
            }
        res = self.Cal.get_object('C', 'i', o)
        self.assertIsNone(res)



[docs]    def test_get_6(self):
        """nested obj in list, self.Cal
        """
        res = self.Cal.get_object('C', 'c')
        self.assertTrue(type(res) is dict)
        self.assertEqual(res['C'],'c')

#
if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()
